normalized: on november 10.
twelve days after our departure from perseus city.
the battleship, tristan, arrived safely in libra.
i was waiting for a man at the libra space-station, along with the kushan mother and daughter.
general william ahle moller of the neo-terras.
i had planned to capture him, after having lured him in by using both these women as bait.
i had already notified the senile yet lustful old man that the brainwashing process on them had been completed.
i had placed both my arms behind my back as i was pretending to be their prisoner, which was all just a sham.
however, i wanted to make it seem like they were the ones who had called moller, after capturing me.
it was all a scheme to help the old man, and beatrice’s husband, lucius romanoff―― the new face of hope.
with that, i would be able to increase the debt of gratitude that lucius romanoff owed me.
both, beatrice and kila, were standing beside me in complete obedience.

both of them looked to be back to her original selves, as the empress and the grim reaper, now that they had been administered with drugs in order to block their nerves from carrying pleasure signals.
however, even though their entire bodies weren’t being tormented by pleasure anymore, their personalities were still the ones which i had created for them.
now that i had the most powerful witch of mars on my side, there was no reason why i couldn’t capture the lecherous old geezer.
there was a sullen look on the faces of both the women.

name: bohgan
normalized: what is with your faces?

name: beatrice
normalized: can’t you tell without the need to say it out loud?

name: kila
normalized: i don’t want to speak to you as well.
they replied while sulking, entirely like spoilt children conversing with their parent.

name: bohgan
normalized: oh dear… are you so annoyed because lucius romanoff is going to take credit for this?
both the women snapped back at me, as if they were taken aback with what i had just said.

name: beatrice
normalized: obviously.
i want to work for you, however, not so that that man can take credit for it!

name: kila
normalized: that’s right!
that guy will be back to his lecherous ways with me as soon as possible!

name: beatrice
normalized: that is a possibility, isn’t it?
that does sound like something that scum would do.

name: kila
normalized: mother, can you please be the one to partner up with that guy?

name: beatrice
normalized: stop kidding me!
i would rather die than have sex with such a man.
if he ever tries to do that, i am just going to kill him!

name: kila
normalized: i am going to kill him as well!
as both the women bared their murderous intent for the man, i spoke up,

name: bohgan
normalized: wait just a moment.
i will end up in a bother if he does die now.
i have planned to impersonate lucius romanoff, and make use of that for my sake.

name: bohgan
normalized: it will “extend” my reach over the universe.
i can understand your feelings well, however, i need you to control them for a while longer.

name: kila
normalized: i can… understand that, however…

name: beatrice
normalized: that’s right.
i understand that, however, i can’t control my feelings.
even though both the women nodded at my words, i could clearly see their dark emotions swirling around them.

name: beatrice
normalized: bohgan… now that i know the joy of being loved by you, just the thought of being touched by that man is enough to my make hair stand on end.
i can’t control my murderous intent, to be honest.

name: kila
normalized: me too, master bohgan.
i will definitely end up killing him, if he comes in front of me now.

name: bohgan
normalized: （oh dear… did i maybe plant a bit too much of hatred for him in them?
even though i had done it to them myself, the hatred that these women were harbouring for him was truly terrible.
the moment i had mentioned lucius romanoff’s name in front of them, they had become unable to hold themselves back from exposing their true intentions.

name: bohgan
normalized: i understand.
i will arrange this in such a way that you girls don’t have to encounter that man.

name: beatrice
normalized: really!?
thank you!

name: kila
normalized: thank you very much, master bohgan!
both of them hugged me with joy-filled faces,
and were about to kiss me on both my left and right cheeks.

name: bohgan
normalized: wait just a moment!
the enemy might suspect you if you are seen behaving like this.
act a bit more like the empress and the grim reaper!

name: beatrice
normalized: ah!
that’s right, isn’t it?
sorry.

name: kila
normalized: forgive me, master bohgan.
both of them responded bashfully, before reverting their faces back to suit their original personalities.
however, i noticed from the corners of my eyes that they were still sneering a bit.

name: bohgan
normalized: he will be arriving here soon.
the old man’s escort consists of 12 specially trained soldiers.
i don’t think they will pose any threat to you, however, don’t lose your focus.

name: beatrice
normalized: of course.

name: kila
normalized: no man can stand up to my knife.
both the women said resolutely, however immediately after that, they began to talk to each other in a bizarre manner.

name: kila
normalized: well, mother?

name: beatrice
normalized: what?

name: kila
normalized: how about we compete to see how many of them we can kill?

name: beatrice
normalized: very well.
that should make it clear which woman is more useful for bohgan.

name: kila
normalized: right?
and there are 12 specially trained soldiers… so, how about we get one of master bohgan’s ejaculation for each one?

name: beatrice
normalized: hoo… that’s a good idea.
in other words, i will be able to monopolize bohgan, if i kill them all.

name: kila
normalized: oh dear.
i don’t intend to give you even one, mother.

name: bohgan
normalized: are you girls just going to ignore my wishes?

name: beatrice
normalized: ah…

name: kila
normalized: n-no… i didn’t mean it like that…
the bizarre spark in both the women was snuffed out, the moment i interrupted them.

name: bohgan
normalized: oh, very well.
if that is what motivates you, then compete with each other to see who is better among you.

name: kila
normalized: thank you very much!

name: beatrice
normalized: leave it to me.
i will exterminate them all in no time!
i felt sympathy for the 12 men, who were going to be killed like insects.
just then, i noticed moller’s car approaching us.

name: beatrice
normalized: he is here.

name: kila
normalized: ufufu
the faces of both the women were shining brilliantly.
that’s it.
that’s the way.
work for me.
like pigs.

name: bohgan
normalized: well then, it is show-time!
devious scheming, raping women, and fighting.
my ambitions would continue to grow.
until the day i would extend my reach over the entire universe.
